content.rendered:
• 150k real followers ($15,000 value)
  • Published in 10 Articles (Medium, Disrupt, Digital Journal, NY Weekly, LA Wire, US Reporter, and Ritz Herald) ($2,480 value)

  • 140+ training videos on how to build and monetize your personal brand or company on Instagram ($1,500 value)
  • Private Community on Discord with Thousands of like-minded 6-10 Figure Entrepreneurs
  • Google Brand Search Campaign Set Up (rank #1 Google)
  • Partnership access (Earn With Us)
  • 24/7 team access (Priceless)
  • Highly recommended maintenance fee after the first 31 days to continue to hit guaranteed engagement numbers included in this package, growth, and access to our private community group. ($549/mo)
